snippet: Ryan Callahan and Carl Hagelin are expected to miss at least part of training camp and perhaps the beginning of next season after each had surgery to repair a torn labrum in the left shoulder.
abstract: New York Rangers forward Ryan Callahan and wing Carl Hagelin are expected to miss at least part of training camp and perhaps beginning of next season after undergoing shoulder surgery.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Callahan and Carl Hagelin are expected to miss at least part of training camp and perhaps the beginning of next season after each had surgery to repair a torn labrum in the left shoulder.

headline.seo: Ryan Callahan and Carl Hagelin Have Shoulder Surgery
headline.main: Two Ranger Forwards Have Shoulder Surgery
